showerReviews.reviewText: … if you can spend the extra bucks and get a hotel. Not many walking trails and terrible bathrooms, there was only 1 shower in the one I went to and not very well kept. There are paved roads though and that’s nice. No electricity for campers …

Nice spots, bathroom is on the older side and could use something more private than a shower curtain for privacy and access to the shower. It feels generally safe here, and has convenient stores and gas station nearby. Nice place to crash …

… . Not a lot of level spaces. There was a fair amount of broken glass in our site. Probably would not recommend. Try to find something with more modern conveniences. Shower houses are very out of date. One shower each side, two stalls
… Showers and toilets are ok, the shower is in the same room as the toilets and you have no door ro close. …

… your assigned lot but it's a really quiet and peaceful place. There are men and women restrooms, each one heated with a spacious and private shower, which really came in handy. Each lot has a grill and firewood, and the grounds are …

… This place looks like it's in a heavy traffic area and it is but the campground feels very secluded and mostly quiet.  They have a decent shower and bathroom.  There are interesting hikes and things to do in the park. …

… in the park, but I assume it will look a lot like the photo throughout.  The park includes campsites with fire pits, and there is s shower in each loop.  It may not measure up to some of the larger parks in terms of natural beauty, …
This is a great place to primitive camp. They have clean shower facilities. Close to metro for trip to D.C. Close to shopping.

Great campsite for our tent camping with kids. Had large lots and no gravel camping pad. We got a no electricity lot that Included water nearby and a shower/bathroom nearby and great trails for walking. …
Stayed for 2 night camping trip and for first timers we enjoyed ourselves. The restroom and shower facilities were in good shape and I appreciated the park staff checking on us periodically. …

The YMCA has pros and cons. Pros are that the facility itself is generally clean, good classes, good hours, nice staff, and a great community of women in the aquatic classes (some of the nicest women I have met in ChCh/Bethesda); the cons …

Been a member here going on 2 years. I’m a swimmer, and for the money this is the best deal in the MVA. The  outdoor and indoor B pool are awesome, although quite busy. Locker room is fine and the staff for the most part are very nice. Is it perfect? No. But overall this a great place to swim.

While the facilities are good, nobody responded to my email when I wanted to suspend and I ended up paying for many months without using the facilities - sign up is easy but cancellation requires a long process - it is not the same as …

Cons: the locker rooms need a lot of cleaning, the rusted shower curtains need to be replaced with the rust-proof ones, the air temperature in the pool areas and between the pools and locker rooms needs to be increased, the water slide …
Everything is fantastic! Except maybe the shower pressure.

showerReviews.reviewText: Cute, small playground. There are also basketball and tennis courts, a baseball field and a walking path. Plenty of benches. The rec center has a bathroom. Street parking only.
It's clean and safe, but the bathrooms could stay open later. They also book some sports on top of each other in the Baseball Field.
The location is perfect, with a nice view. The young kids playground has a nice sandbox, and the bathrooms are very well maintained.

showerReviews.reviewText: All it takes is one power tripping lifeguard with a microphone to ruin a pool day. The facilities are clean, there are plenty of chairs, but they need to get rid of the cops doing a pat down at the front door and not let that head lifeguard have access to the mic because he interrupts the music every 10-30 seconds.

I have a great time each time I come. I have been coming here since last year. I just wish they made more of an effort to keep the bathrooms clean and maybe the floors a bit more dry during the swimming seasons. Maybe putting some of those …

locations.title: Long Bridge Aquatics & Fitness Center
locations.content: Long Bridge Aquatics & Fitness Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … maintained, and comfortable to swim in, in any weather thanks to adequate heating. The changing rooms - shower, bathrooms, lockers - all proper, well maintained as well. The only thing you need to track, and this is a minor hassle, is …

Bring your own locker room lock and slippers for locker room/shower areas - the floor is unfinished concrete and pretty gross. For a top notch swim facility the locker rooms and shower leave much to be desired. Pool is nice, lots of extras …
… family changing /shower area.

… the older Rec Center ones I've been in previously. They have Women's and Men's, but also a space for all genders with multiple enclosed changing areas with a toilet and shower. The lockers themselves were spacious and had loops for people …

… there are 15 unused lanes. It is frustrating. There's a nice hot tub and the shower facilities are great, including soap, shampoo, and conditioner dispenser. The pool is closed to the public late afternoon every weekday for swim practice.

Cons: the locker rooms need a lot of cleaning, the rusted shower curtains need to be replaced with the rust-proof ones, the air temperature in the pool areas and between the pools and locker rooms needs to be increased, the water slide …
Everything is fantastic! Except maybe the shower pressure.

showerReviews.reviewText: Took my seven month old baby to swim on a Sunday around noon, and we had a good time. Quite a few people there but did not seem super busy. Very nice, large and clean facility. I wish the pool were a bit warmer. Knocking off a star because …
No changing table in the men's restroom. Completely unacceptable to have a multi million dollar facility and no diaper changing station. Had to change the Baba on the sink counter. Not optimal. …

Great place visiting a friend the water is perfect temperature for swimming.  Mens locker room not enough curtains for showering.  I'm glad they have a swimsuit dryer it works really good. Plenty of parking nearby.
